p: Our hypotheses regarding the relative frequencies of moral engagement and disengagement in the comments on each newspaper were also supported. Engagement was significantly more frequent than disengagement for comments on the Guardian, χ 2(1) = 6.696, p = .010; the opposite was true for the Daily Mail, χ 2(1) = 58.909, p < .001, and Telegraph, χ 2(1) = 57.301, p < .001.
